channel.title: Help with interface 4161 (Crafting)
channel.description:
Hello fellow coders!
I have been trying to add gold crafting to my server, but I am having troubles figuring out how to get interface 4161 to show the makable objects rather than display that you need the moulds.
I've bombarded it with multiple types of frames, including 126, but was unable to find out how to make it show the different rings, etc.
If you have any information or hints on what I should try please post. Remember that I am not asking for a gold-crafting tut, I just need the interface.
Thanks!

item.title: Help with interface 4161 (Crafting)
item.dc:creator: @_Nirvana † Nirvana †
item.description:
@_Nirvana wrote:

yeah, i did that about 5 times. trying to see if the others were around that interface number.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with interface 4161 (Crafting)
item.dc:creator: @heathtech heathtech
item.description:
@heathtech wrote:

Yeah probably. I hate looking for interfaces, though, because if you test the wrong one, then it crashes the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with interface 4161 (Crafting)

item.description:
@_Nirvana wrote:

it must be a different interface #

Read full topic

item.title: Help with interface 4161 (Crafting)
item.dc:creator: @heathtech heathtech
item.description:
@heathtech wrote:

Don’t think of me as an idiot.

I don’t use showInterface(####).

I use sendFrame164() for chatbox interfaces and sendFrame248() for the interfaces in the main screen.

I’ve already tried using something like this to test all the text visibilities:

for(int i4=4162; i4<=4250; i4++) { sendFrame126("Test "+(i4-4161), i4); }

I see changes in text, but not the ones for the Jewelry.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with interface 4161 (Crafting)
item.dc:creator: @_Nirvana † Nirvana †
item.description:
@_Nirvana wrote:

well i’ll get items and stuff then make a command and see if they show

Read full topic

item.title: Help with interface 4161 (Crafting)
item.dc:creator: @heathtech heathtech
item.description:
@heathtech wrote:

4161 is the one with the moulds, but I have a feeling it is also used with the Jewelry too. I think you are supposed to send some kind of frame to tell it that you actually have the moulds, but I haven’t a clue which frame to send or which subframe to send.

That’s why I created this topic, heh.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with interface 4161 (Crafting)
item.dc:creator: @_Nirvana † Nirvana †
item.description:
@_Nirvana wrote:

is 4161 the one with moulds or all the jewellery

EDIT:
showInterface(####);

didnt you know that :S

Read full topic
